call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent failed to offer accommodation

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Jennifer. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I want to dispute a charge on my statement.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I'm hard of hearing, can you speak up?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me see what I can do.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: That's not helpful. I need assistance now.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me transfer you to my supervisor.
